descriptionHtml:
Ever wonder why torches give off a metallic, white light that only brightens two feet around you? No longer! Now, all fires, torches, and candles give a brighter, warmer light.


If I\'ve appeared to miss something, a light looks just awful, or a certain area\'s lighting has gone to hell, feel free to contact me!

[color=#ffffff][b][size=3]===Version History===[/size][/b][/color]
0.15: Initial Release
0.20: Fixed glaringly orange torch effects, minor cleaning



===FAQ===
Q: Does this mod conflict with Dynamic Torches
A: No

Q: Does this mod conflict with Drop Lit Torches?
A: It shouldn\'t. However, load this mod after your DLT mod just to be safe.
author: Wallam
